Name: BATTER BURST
About the game: STORY: The main character of this game was unfortunate. Unreasonable violence... Rough words... She was the limit. Anger reached the peak. that moment. She is equipped with the power to destroy everything. When she burns something, it becomes a flammable ash. It's almost like magic. Oh, how wonderful! Let's enjoy revenge. GAME SYSTEM: This game is a side scrolling action. The operation is very simple. Just burning an object will make everything explode. It is very pleasant. If you defeat the enemy well it will be a high score. Let's do Combo! Z key normal attack (long press) X key trap attack (1st time · installation, 2nd time · explosion) C key special bomb (using gauge) Let's use attacks separately and blow off the enemy!
